attributes.additional_details:
America currently in most states have the none uniform rule and it seems to be working.

Many children complain that they don't feel themselves and feel very uncomfortable in there uniform.
attributes.background: Don't you think when you are wearing school uniform you are not showing individuality and people can't see you as a person because you are being "Printed" as the same person along with your peers. Also some familys can't affored uniforms which are reallly expensive and it would be better.
